mapper.insert: INSERT INTO popup (adminId, storeId, title, content, time, address, startDate, endDate, latitude, longitude, notice, storeUrl, snsUrl, parking, fee, noKids, pet, wifi, viewCount) VALUES (#{admin.id}, #{store.id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{time}, #{address}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{notice}, #{storeUrl}, #{snsUrl}, #{parking}, #{fee}, #{noKids}, #{pet}, #{wifi}, #{viewCount})
